items.title: AI Isn't Enough: Why Pearson's Stock Looks Overvalued And Vulnerable
items.description: Pearson plc reports a 10% profit boost, but rising risks and high valuation warrant caution. Click for more on PSO stock prospects post Q4 earnings.
